StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCandidatesToCon.rm]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@RSID int AS
SELECT CCC.PERSON_ID, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS SSN, RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME) + ', ' + RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME) + SPACE(1) + RTRIM(ISNULL(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, '')) AS PERSON_NAME, MC.GENDER_CODE AS GENDER, NWA.NWA_ID, RO.ORGANIZATION_ID AS RS_ID, 'RS ' + RO.NAME AS RS_NAME, CCC.CONTRACT_ID, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, C.COMPONENT_CODE, ISNULL(CCC.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID, 0) AS PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID, ISNULL((SELECT PG.PROGRAM_CODE + SPACE(1) + PG.PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION FROM PROGRAM PG WHERE PG.PROGRAM_ID = (SELECT PA.PROGRAM_ID FROM PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA WHERE PA.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = CCC.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID)), '') AS PROGRAM, ISNULL(CCC.QSN, '') AS QSN FROM CANDIDATE_CRITERIA_CONFIRMATION CCC INNER JOIN PERSON P ON CCC.PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON CCC.PERSON_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN NWA ON CCC.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON NWA.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO ON OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON CCC.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID WHERE RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = @RSID AND CCC.QUALIFIED IS NULL
